description: If you’re looking for a unique twist on your traditional&nbsp;old-fashioned, look no further than this Mexican version. You don't have to choose between&nbsp;tequila and&nbsp;Mezcal because it comes with both!
name: Mezcal Old Fashioned

recipeInstructions.name: Combine tequila, mezcal, agave, and bitters in a cocktail shaker filled with ice.
recipeInstructions.text: Combine tequila, mezcal, agave, and bitters in a cocktail shaker filled with ice.

recipeInstructions.name: Shake well until well-combined and chilled.
recipeInstructions.text: Shake well until well-combined and chilled.

recipeInstructions.name: Strain into a rocks glass with one large ice cube or three standard ice cubes.
recipeInstructions.text: Strain into a rocks glass with one large ice cube or three standard ice cubes.

recipeInstructions.name: Flame orange peel with a lit match by running it along the orange side and edges. Drop orange peel in glass and serve.
